IncidentDef.label: Mechanitor cargo ship crash
IncidentDef.letterText: A large mechanitor cargo ship is crashing nearby along with a dozen of hostile mechanoids acting as its guards. The ship itself is full of valueble raw mech resources as well as rare mechanoid parts that are used to gestate powerful mechanoids. Try to engage the threat with utmost caution and be careful on the ship itself.

IncidentDef.label: crashing scavenger ship
IncidentDef.letterText: A scavenger ship is crashing somewhere in your map. This ship appears to contain valuble cargo that are ripe for the taking, but its landing path is unpredictable, so beware.

IncidentDef.label: Overdriven mech fabricator
IncidentDef.letterText: A mech fabricator ship have spawned in your map! The mech fabricator will fabricate mech variants of the alpha class every 1 hour, and it is protected by a horde of mechanoids. Engage the threat before it overwhelms your colony!

IncidentDef.label: Overdriven mech fabricator

IncidentDef.label: Psychic droner ship
IncidentDef.letterText: A psychic droner ship has landed near your colony! The ship can drive your colonist insane with a high chance of them going berserk every three days, not only that, the ship is heavily shielded and protected by a hostile group of mech variants. Destroy the ship before its too late!

IncidentDef.label: EMI dynamo ship
IncidentDef.letterText: An EMI dynamo ship has landed near your colony! The ship can disable all electrical devices and can pollute the entire region with radiation, not only that, the ship is heavily shielded and protected by a hostile group of mech variants. Destroy the ship before its too late!

IncidentDef.label: toxic spewer ship
IncidentDef.letterText: A toxic spewer ship has landed near your colony! The ship will pollute the atmosphere with noxious chemicals and call upon a toxic rain, not only that, the ship is heavily shielded and protected by a hostile group of mech variants. Destroy the ship before its too late!

IncidentDef.label: cold snap ship
IncidentDef.letterText: An advanced cold snap ship has landed near your colony! The ship can reduce the temperature to absolute cold and can inflict heat nullifying nanites that nullifies the victim's resistance to cold temperature, not only that, the ship is heavily shielded and protected by a hostile group of mech variants. Destroy the ship before its too late!

IncidentDef.label: heat wave ship
IncidentDef.letterText: An advanced heat wave ship has landed near your colony! The ship can increase the temperature to extreme heat and can inflict cold nullifying nanites that nullifies the victim's resistance to heat temperature, not only that, the ship is heavily shielded and protected by a hostile group of mech variants. Destroy the ship before its too late!

IncidentDef.label: crimson ship
IncidentDef.letterText: A crimson ship has landed near your colony! The ship can cover the entire region with crimson rain and can infect a humanlike victim with the rage virus, not only that, the ship is heavily shielded and protected by a hostile group of mech variants. Destroy the ship before its too late!

GameConditionDef.label: extreme cold snap
GameConditionDef.description: A distant mechanoid capital ship have altered the region's temperature using a climate altering satellite, plunging the entire region in extreme cold and heavy snow, along with infecting the local population with heat nullifying nanites that render their insulation to the cold useless.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: a front of extreme cold will flood the area around [map_definite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration], killing outdoor plant and animal life
GameConditionDef.letterText:
A distant mechanoid ship have altered the temperature of the entire region.

Any person or creature not under a roof will slowly die from hypothermia while being infected with nanites.

It will last for anywhere between a few days to over a quadrum.
